lines.content: * Command takes in the parsed input from the user and splits it into three categories.
* They are the command type, description of the task and the date. Depending on the
* type of command, description and date may be empty. Command then returns the
* appropriate mesage to return to Logic class to output to the user.
public Command(String commandInput, String descriptionInput, String dateInput) {
* Executes the given command received from the Parser class.
* Returns the appropriate message to the Logic class.
returnString = "Got it. I've added this task:\n" + tasks.get(LIST_INDEX - 1) + "\n"
+ "Now you have " + String.valueOf(LIST_INDEX) + " tasks in the list.";
returnString = "Got it. I've added this task:\n" + tasks.get(LIST_INDEX - 1) + "\n"
+ "Now you have " + String.valueOf(LIST_INDEX) + " tasks in the list.";
returnString = "Got it. I've added this task:\n" + tasks.get(LIST_INDEX - 1) + "\n"
+ "Now you have " + String.valueOf(LIST_INDEX) + " tasks in the list.";
String listMessage = "Here is the list you requested!";
returnString = "Nice! I've marked this task as done:\n"
returnString = "Noted. I've removed this task:\n" + tasks.get(deleteIndex - 1) + "\n";
returnString += "Now you have " + String.valueOf(LIST_INDEX) + " tasks in the list.";
* Returns the boolean isBye as a way to tell Logic class when is it appropriate to exit the while loop.
* Database class gets the filepath from Logic class and handles the saving of data and uploading
* Loads task from duke.txt data file if it exists. If the file does
* not exist, the file is created.
* @return "tasksCopy" previous state of tasks if the data file exists,
* or an empty file if the data file does not exist.
//if savedFile is not present and a new file is created
System.out.println("Oops! An error cropped up while loading file!");
* Saves the entire taskList into data storage file.
System.out.println("Oops! An error cropped up while saving");
System.out.println("Oops! An error occurred during saving.");
* Updates the data storage file by appending the most
* recently added file to the end of the file.
System.out.println("Oops! An error occurred during autosave.");
* Duke class acts as entry point to programme.
* Logic class runs the main logic of the programme.
* Runs the main logic of the program.
* Welcome message is printed to user and programme enters a while loop to repeatedly get input
* from the user and then correspondingly respond to them. Input is put through the Parser class
* which then put through the Command class. The output of the Command class is given to the
* UserInterface Class to print out the message to the user.
Command commandHandler = new Command(parseInput.getCommand(), parseInput.getDescription(), parseInput.getDate());
* Contains common messages to be printed out.
* Returns an ASCII art of PEPE the frog.
* If the position is unset, NaN is returned.
* If the position is unset, NaN is returned.
* If the position is unset, NaN is returned.
* If the position is unset, NaN is returned.
String exit = "Bye my little pogchamp! Hope to see you again soon!";
* Parser class gets the raw input from Logic class and then returns the specified arguments of interest
* to the Logic class. These are the type of command, the description of the dask and the date.
* @return appropriate information depending on the method called.
* Returns position of the first whitespace encountered in the input.
//sees if character at that index is a whitespace
* Returns position of the backslash character used to mark out the border for description and date.
* Returns the description of th task.
//find first whitespace and assigns everything up to that point to description variable
//find first whitespace and first backslash and assign whatever is in the middle to description variable
//if description is empty or /at is not being used
//find first whitespace and first backslash and assign whatever is in the middle to description variable
//if description is empty or /by is not being used
//date is not relevant for other commands
* UserInterface interacts with the user for input and output.
* Returns input given from the user.
* If the position is unset, NaN is returned.
* Prints out message from programme to user.
* If the position is unset, NaN is returned.
this.errorMessage = "OH NO! The \"deadline\" command should be in this format: \ndeadline <task name> /by <date>";
this.errorMessage = "OH NO! \"delete\" command is to be followed by only one integer!";
this.errorMessage = "OH NO! Invalid list index! Has the task at that index been added yet?";
this.errorMessage = "OH NO! \"done\" command is to be followed by only one integer!";
this.errorMessage = "OH NO! Invalid list index! Has the task at that index been added yet?";
public abstract class DukeException extends Exception{
this.errorMessage = "OH NO! The \"event\" command should be in this format: \nevent <task name> /by <date>";
this.errorMessage = "OH NO! I do not know what command is that!";
this.errorMessage = "OH NO! The \"todo\" command should be in this format: \ntodo <task name>";
* Deadline class to represent a task which has a deadline.
* @return modified message when the toString() method is called.
* Changes deadline task in list format
* @return string of deadline task in saved file format
* Event class to represent a task which has an event.
* @return modified message when the toString() method is called.
* Changes event task in list format
* @return string of event task in saved file format
* Task class to represent a task.
* Is a parent class to Todo, Event and Deadline classes.
* @return modified message when the toString() method is called.
* Returns a String whether a task is done or not.
* If the task is done, X is returned.
* If the task is not done, a whitespace is returned.
return (isDone ? "X" : " "); // mark done task with X
* Sets a task as done by setting isDone as true.
* Psuedo abstract method to change task in list format
* @return string of task in saved file format
* Todo class to represent a task that needs to be done.
* @return modified message when the toString() method is called.
* Changes todo task in list format
* @return string of todo task in saved file format
